definition: Li Yu (c. 937-978), given name of the final ruler of Tang of the Five Southern dynasties Li Houzhu 李後主|李后主, a renowned poet
plum
surname Li
brilliant/glorious

sentences.english: Li Yu was more of a poet than a king.
sentences.chinese: 与其说李煜是一位国君，倒不如说他是一位诗人。

sentences.english: Collection of poems being able to purchase Li Yu in where?
sentences.chinese: 在哪里能买到李煜的诗集？

sentences.english: Be badly in need of Li Qingzhao and sentimental and grieved Li Yu poem word , have annotation more well.
sentences.chinese: 急需李清照和李煜伤感和悲痛的诗词，有注解更好。

sentences.english: Li Yu, the emperor of Southern Tang Dynasty, in his poems many contented "wind."
sentences.chinese: 南唐后主李煜，在他写的词中也颇多“风”。
